TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit SystemFonts extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Contains properties that expose the system resources that concern fonts.
Gets the metric that determines the font family of the caption of the nonclient area of a nonminimized window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Obtain the metric from SPI_GETNONCLIENTMETRICS. See [SystemParametersInfo](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/sysinfo/base/systemparametersinfo.asp). ## XAML Attribute Usage <*object property*="{ SystemFonts.CaptionFontFamily`}`"/>

Docs.summary: Gets the for the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML Attribute Usage \<*object property*="{ { SystemFonts.CaptionFontFamilyKey}}"/>

remarks.format: ## Remarks Obtain the metric from SPI_GETNONCLIENTMETRICS. See [SystemParametersInfo](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/sysinfo/base/systemparametersinfo.asp). ## XAML Attribute Usage <*object property*="{ SystemFonts.CaptionFontSize`}`"/>
